code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Breadcrumbs=()=>{const location=useLocation();const pathnames=location.pathname.split('/').filter(x=>x);const displayNameMapping={'layout':' ','toolform':'Tool Form','categoryform':'Category Form','executivesummary':'Summary','masteroperatingplan':'Layout','about':'About','login':'Login','signup':'Sign Up'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-4xl mb-4",children:[pathnames.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"text-4xl hover:text-blue-600",children:"Home"}),pathnames.map((value,index)=>{const isLast=index===pathnames.length-1;const to="/".concat(pathnames.slice(0,index+1).join('/'));const displayName=displayNameMapping[value]||value;return isLast?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-4xl",children:[' > ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-4xl",children:displayName})]},to):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"text-4xl",children:[' > ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:to,className:"text-4xl text-blue-600",children:displayName})]},to);})]});};export default Breadcrumbs;
